com.emc.vipr.services.s3
Class S3ClientFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.emc.vipr.services.s3.S3ClientFactory

public class S3ClientFactory
extends Object

This class looks on the classpath for a file named viprs3.properties and uses it to configure a connection to ViPR. The supported properties are:

vipr.access_key_id
(Required) The access key (user ID)
vipr.secret_key
(Required) The shared secret key
vipr.endpoint
(Required) The endpoint hostname or IP address of the ViPR data service server to use
vipr.namespace
(Optional) The ViPR namespace to connect to. Generally this is required if your endpoint is an IP or not in the format of {namespace}.company.com

Author:
cwikj

Method Detail

getProperties

public static Properties getProperties()
                                throws FileNotFoundException,
                                       IOException
Locates and loads the properties file for the test configuration. This file can reside in one of two places: somewhere in the CLASSPATH or in the user's home directory.

Returns:
the contents of the properties file as a Properties object.
Throws:
FileNotFoundException - if the file was not found
IOException - if there was an error reading the file.
